messages.title: Can you see into the future?
messages.content: The Tories have steered us back to the past. Don't let them take you even further back. Austerity has undermined our public services...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vote for security and dignity in old age, Vote Labour
Vote for a home and a family wage in a growing economy, Vote Labour
Vote for a future of partnership not isolation, Vote Labour
Vote for the keys to home and a decent wage in life, Vote Labour

mentions.candidate: Barry Gardiner for Brent North June 8th

issues.brexitEurope: Vote for a future of partnership not isolation.
issues.economy: Vote for a home and a family wage in a growing economy.
issues.health: Vote for security and dignity in old age.

housing.content: Vote for the keys to home and a decent wage in life.

leaflet.personalStatement: Can you see into the future? Barry wants to help take you there with Labour.
